data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=js06-JrqvKkQ7kNvgEiAa0P&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDeJfiSNf3OUG80RuKUOuVzy5BzLTqjJu0vxeS3bV6rtw&oe=670CFEB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=mLGWGToDMzUQ7kNvgEbCNRs&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCTmfud0KZRoYDm0HRnlekris1b6Z4qoRmgb8NfA8UtuA&oe=670D0C52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=dqBp6KnacmcQ7kNvgFY_WGz&_nc_ht=scontent-hel3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCdKkfqQOpi8IoXKYilBo141Jrg7hQ2ihKblQeByx0cyA&oe=670CF789)
